name: Fly High (itch) (CapMorgan, Plague.Octor)
description:
Controls:  Move-Arrow, WASD.    Place Feather-Mouse;

This is a standard platformer, but you are given a gift. the gift of.... a feather.  use your best platformer with the help of your feathers to beat the challenges this game has to offer!

Warning: this game at the start has a glitch that I have no idea how to fix, and that is that it need to be put into full screen in order to see the full screen.
